p: HESAE was further extracted with ethanol to obtain compounds with lower polarity and the phytochemical analysis revealed the presence of adenosine and herierin III. Hydro-alcoholic extractions have been recommended for the recovering of biologically active compounds of mushrooms including phenolic compounds and flavonoids [ 54, 55]. Further, Jiang et al. [ 54] showed that anhydrous ethanol appeared to be the most efficient solvent in the extraction of high-polarity components of H. erinaceus contributing to high antioxidant activity as measured by reducing power and free radical scavenging assays.
